summary: With Share Bear as the emcee, the Care Bears take part in the Care-a-Lot Rescue Awards.
cast: Ashleigh Ball|Kathleen Barr|Garry Chalk|Shannon Chan-Kent|Ian James Corlett|Richard Ian Cox|Anna Cummer|Peter Kelamis|Andrea Libman|Scott McNeil|Tracey Moore|Kelly Sheridan|Tabitha St. Germain|Sam Vincent
title: Care Bears to the Rescue
